name: answer
description: Answers a paranoia question sent to you.

options.name: answer
options.description: The answer to the paranoia question.

name: dare
description: Gives a dare that has to be completed.

options.name: rating
options.description: The maturity level of the topics the question can relate to.

name: help
description: Get a list of commands.

name: invite
description: Add the bot to another server.

name: nhie
description: Gives a random Never Have I Ever question to be answered.

options.name: rating
options.description: The maturity level of the topics the question can relate to.

name: paranoia
description: Gives a paranoia question or sends one to a user.

options.name: target
options.description: The user to send a paranoia question to.

options.name: rating
options.description: The maturity level of the topics the question can relate to.

name: ping
description: Check if the bot is online.

name: premium check
description: Check if this current server has premium activated.

name: premium list
description: List your premium servers.

name: premium activate
description: Add the current server as a premium server.

name: premium deactivate
description: Remove a server from your premium slots.

options.name: server
options.description: The server id to remove from your premium slots (found from /premium list) default current server.

name: questions list
description: List all the custom questions added so far.

options.name: type
options.description: The type of question to list.

options.name: rating
options.description: The rating of questions to list.

options.name: page
options.description: The page number of questions of list.

name: questions add
description: Adds a new custom question for this server.

options.name: type
options.description: The type of question to add

options.name: rating
options.description: The rating of question to add.

options.name: question
options.description: The question to add.

name: questions remove
description: Removes a custom question from this server.

options.name: id
options.description: The ID of the question to remove (get the ID using /customquestion list).

name: questions view
description: View a custom question from this server.

options.name: id
options.description: The id of the question to view (get the ID using /questions list).

name: questions update
description: Update a custom question from this server.

options.name: id
options.description: The id of the question to update (get the ID using /customquestion list).

options.name: type
options.description: The new type of question.

options.name: rating
options.description: The new rating of question.

options.name: question
options.description: The new question text.

name: random
description: Gives a random question from any category (truth, dare, paranoia, wyr, nhie).

options.name: rating
options.description: The maturity level of the topics the question can relate to.

name: serversettings view
description: View premium server settings.

name: serversettings showparanoia
description: Set how often paranoia questions are shown.

options.name: frequency
options.description: How often questions are shown as a percent chance (0 for never, 100 for always).

name: serversettings disablequestion
description: Disable a global question from being shown in this server.

options.name: id
options.description: The id of the question to disable.

name: serversettings enablequestion
description: Enable a global question that has been disabled.

options.name: id
options.description: The ID of the question to enable.

name: serversettings toggleglobals
description: Disable/enable all global questions in this server.

name: serversettings togglebuttons
description: Disable/enable buttons showing on question messages.

name: settings view
description: View a channel's settings.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to view the settings for.

name: settings disablerating
description: Disable a question rating for a channel.

options.name: rating
options.description: The rating to disable.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to disable the rating in.

name: settings enablerating
description: Enable a question rating for a channel.

options.name: rating
options.description: The rating to enable.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to enable the rating in.

name: settings mute
description: Disable all commands in a channel.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to mute the bot in.

name: settings unmute
description: Reenable all commands in a channel.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to unmute the bot in.

name: settings muteserver
description: Disable all commands in all channels serverwide.

name: settings unmuteserver
description: Reenable all commands in all channels serverwide.

name: skip
description: Skips a paranoia question sent to you if the question is stuck.

name: stats
description: List some statistics on the bot!

name: suggest
description: Suggest a question to be added to the bot.

options.name: type
options.description: The command the question will be used for.

options.name: rating
options.description: The maturity level of the topics the question can relate to.

options.name: question
options.description: The question that will ba asked.

name: tod
description: Gives a random truth or dare question.

options.name: rating
options.description: The maturity level of the topics the question can relate to.

name: truth
description: Gives a random question that has to be answered truthfully.

options.name: rating
options.description: The maturity level of the topics the question can relate to.

name: wyr
description: Gives a random Would You Rather question to be answered.

options.name: rating
options.description: The maturity level of the topics the question can relate to.
